registro.err.sin_sid_disponible: Your account has been created, but we were unable to log you in
configurar_a2f.explicación: In order to access this website, you must enable 2FA
configurar_a2f.no_perder: Do not lose this key, as you will not be able to recover your account nor your account data
configurar_a2f.no_compartir: Do not share this key with anyone
configurar_a2f.usar_autenticador: This key should be used in combination with a 2FA app. One option is Google Authenticator, but there are other alternatives available if you prefer.
configurar_a2f.instalar_autenticador_and: Click here to install Google Authenticator on Google Play
configurar_a2f.instalar_autenticador_app: Click here to install Google Authenticator on App Store
comenzar_md.nombre_de_usuario: Comma-separated list of the usernames of others in the conversation:
comenzar_md.nombre_de_conversación: Conversation name — should not include double quote (") nor ascii 0x1F
general.debes_configurar_a2f: You must configure 2FA to use the account
app.doble_comillas_inválido_en_nombre_de: Conversation name cannot include double quotes (")
app.no_se_encontró_uuid_abierto: Unable to find an available UUID
recibir_clave_privada.título: Recieve and Save Private Key | Mensajeador
recibir_clave_privada.comenzar: Receive and save private key from another device (you must first start the sending process)
enviar_clave_privada.comenzar: Securely send your private key to another device
